definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The machine is named after its inventor.
sentences.chinese: 这台机器以其发明者的名字命名。

sentences.english: The contract binds the company to pay royalties to the inventor.
sentences.chinese: 合同使这家公司必须付给发明者专利权使用费。

sentences.english: The dish was originally named after the inventor Ding Baozhen, whose title was Kung Pao.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜起初是以它的发明者丁宝桢命名的。

sentences.english: A patent gives inventors exclusive rights to their inventions for a fixed period of time.
sentences.chinese: 专利授予发明者对其发明在一定时期内的专有权。

sentences.english: Edison, the inventor of light, was said to be stupid when he was young.
sentences.chinese: 电灯的发明者爱迪生在幼年时曾被认为很愚钝。

sentences.english: And each of them was invented by people who were in their 20s.
sentences.chinese: 而且每一项的发明者当时都是20几岁。

sentences.english: SUF is a member of IFIA, the International Federation of Inventors Associations.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典发明者协会是国际发明者联合会的成员之一。

sentences.english: SUF is a member of IFIA, the International Federation of Inventors Associations.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典发明者协会是国际发明者联合会的成员之一。

sentences.english: Apple mania has even inspired grass-roots inventors.
sentences.chinese: 对苹果的痴狂也激发了草根发明者的灵感。

sentences.english: The original system was called DREF after the developer, Dr. Fueher.
sentences.chinese: 最初这种系统称为德雷夫，这是发明者的名字。

sentences.english: He was one of the earliest inventors of the motion-picture machine.
sentences.chinese: 他是电影机的最早发明者之一。

sentences.english: He is now regarded as an independent inventor of and contributor to calculus.
sentences.chinese: 他现在被视为一个独立的发明者和贡献者演算。

sentences.english: These include writer James Fenimore Cooper and inventor Samuel Morse.
sentences.chinese: 这些措施包括作家库柏和发明者塞缪尔莫尔斯。

sentences.english: The god of fire, Hephaestus, was the forger of the thunderbolts of Zeus.
sentences.chinese: 火神赫菲斯托斯是宙斯雷电的发明者。

sentences.english: The invention of 1 Kodak color films is musician.
sentences.chinese: 柯达彩色胶卷的发明者曾是音乐家。

definition: the earliest ancestor/originator (of a tradition, school of thought etc)
to invent and innovate/inventions and innovations
Edison (name)/Thomas Alva Edison (1847-1931), American inventor and businessman

pinyin: ji4 suan4 ji1 ke1 xue2 jia1
